Docs.summary: Contains classes for creating custom user interface behavior for components at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following list shows the classes included in this namespace:
- A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> class for handling painting and hit-testing.
- An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class for managing a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects.
- A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class for managing the custom user interface in a designer.
- A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine> class that represents horizontal and vertical line segments that assist users in aligning components at design time.
